page.title: 06Farming page 2.
page.content: Take for example the cows.Many years ago there were only 15 cows on the farm. They were kept in a byre in winter,and had to be milked and cleaned out by hand. Now there are 120 cattle,kept in straw courts in winter,and are milked by machine. Potato planting and harvesting have also changed greatly. Not so long ago, people planted potatoes by hand from an open sack tied round their waist.It took around four days to plant 15-20 acres.Last week, Mr Stirling's farm workers planted the 43 acre field beside our school in three days.As well as cereals ,Mr. Stirling,has started to plant flax and oil seed rape.
